mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info ( room_roomtype, room_service, room_size, room_minper, room_maxper, room_peak, room_semipeak, room_off, accommodation_id ) VALUES ( #{roomRoomtype}, #{roomService}, #{roomSize}, #{roomMinper}, #{roomMaxper}, #{roomPeak}, #{roomSemipeak}, #{roomOff}, #{accommodationId} )
mapper.update: update room_info set room_roomtype = #{roomRoomtype}, room_service = #{roomService}, room_size = #{roomSize}, room_minper =#{roomMinper}, room_maxper = #{roomMaxper}, room_peak = #{roomPeak}, room_semipeak = #{roomSemipeak}, room_off = #{roomOff}, accommodation_id = #{accommodationId} where accommodation_id=#{accommodationId}
